summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Jonesaica Infrastructure Solutions website. All core functionality working including API endpoints, product catalog, e-commerce integration, forms, and user flows.

design_issues.issue: Console warning about window.SnipcartSettings not defined
design_issues.impact: Non-functional - just a console warning, Snipcart works properly

passed_tests: GET /api/products with category filters (inverters, batteries, panels)
Product cards display with sale/regular prices and SAVE badges
Snipcart Add to Cart buttons (18 found and properly configured)
Contact form submission with all required fields
Quote request form submission with success page
Customer capture modal appears after 5 seconds on first visit
API integration between frontend and backend
